actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service..

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reinstatement of civil service retirement survivor annuities for certain widows and widowers whose remarriages occurred before July 18, 1966 and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the reinstatement of civil service retirement survivor annuities for specified widows and widowers of Federal employees whose remarriages occurred before July 18, 1966. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8341)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reinstatement of civil service retirement survivor annuities for certain widows and widowers whose remarriages occurred before July 18, 1966 and for other purposes.
